name: assert.AssertionError
summary: Indicates the failure of an assertion. All errors thrown by the assert module will be instances of the AssertionError class.

methods.name: constructor
methods.summary: A subclass of Error that indicates the failure of an assertion.

properties.name: actual
properties.summary: Set to the actual argument for methods such as assert.strictEqual().

properties.name: code
properties.summary: Value is always ERR_ASSERTION to show that the error is an assertion error.

properties.name: expected
properties.summary: Set to the expected value for methods such as assert.strictEqual().

properties.name: generatedMessage
properties.summary: Indicates if the message was auto-generated (true) or not.

properties.name: operator
properties.summary: Set to the passed in operator value.
